description: Yandex Go is a one-page website (landing) promoting scooters.
The web page was created using Editor X advanced creation platform for
website development. There is an adaptive layout with main breakpoints being
1440px, 900px and 375px. For smaller screens images are arranged into a slider,
controlled by on-click events (JS and Velo's API).
Yandex Go is a one-page website (landing) promoting scooters. The website was created
with HTML, SCSS and jQuery, hosted in GH-Pages. It has adaptive layout, main breakpoints
are 1440px, 900px and 375px. For smaller screens, images are arranged into a slider
controlled by simple jQuery scripts for on-click events.
Online Zoo is a website that shows information about animals from different zoos
with web cameras. The website was created with HTML, SCSS, jQuery. It has interactive
elements, form, custom scroll, etc. The breakpoints are 1600px, 1000px and 640px.
Culture Portal is a multilingual web portal about the culture of Belarus,
developed as a team project. The website was created with React/redux libraries,
styled with Material-UI. The localization was realised with React-intl library.

description: Awesome Chat - Simple WebSocket Chat-application created with React/redux, Material-UI
and Bootstrap libraries. It has push-notifications controlled by a Switch button,
a content-editable text field and emoticons. Before sending a message, the input data
is transformed into a plane text and smiles are replaced with their codes
On receiving a message, the smiles are rerenderred in Chat Block as Image components.
There is a simple Login option, autoload of all messages sent to the chat, websocket
status bar. Autodeployment is set from a Github repository to Render.com .
The app is created with pure JS, using JS DOM manipulation, AJAX enquiries, youtube API, Babel,
Webpack. It is a web app for searching the YouTube content by keywords. The search result is
presented in the form of cards with the detailed information about the video clips. Main features: ...

features: Entire page HTML is created by JavaScript function when page is loaded
Search result is arranged into endless scroll - slider (touch scroll in mobile devices)
Pagination is created after first chunk of search result is received
Resize of slider and pagination according to width of device, Responsive layout
Youtube API is used to get search results, every unit has API info (name of channel, date, views, description, link to the video

description: Restaurant Fesco is a single page website that contains the information about the restaurant.
The website is created with HTML, SCSS, JavaScript. It has a custom Navigation Bar with desktop
and mobile layout, form for booking a table, with styled selects and a date picker (js-datepicker library).
Piskel Clone is a simplified clone of Piskel, a web-based tool for creating animated sprites
& pixel art. The app is created with React/redux libraries, Google API, Firebase database,
Canvas element with canvas scripting API for drawing graphics and animations. Main features:...

features.name: Google Auth API is used to sign in the app, on success the promise returns Google User data
Sprites can be saved on the User's Google drive, links for sharing will be generated
All animated sprites are created with Canvas API via JavaScript (jQuery), no libraries
Main drawing tools: pen, line, rectangle, circle, paint (fill), erase
For pippete tool the function for color match is written, which compares the picked color with previous color
There is a simple color pannel with current and previous colors that can be swapped
The left block of frames allows to create a new frame, copy, delete or swap other frames
The right block allows to make settings for layers, FPS and palette
The side block pannel contains some settings for Canvas and export/import
After signing in, all saved sprites are fetched from FireBase and displayed in User Gallery
When user saves the sprite to the gallery, it is added to FireBase database
User can delete the sprite from the gallery, it will be removed from FireBase database
User can export animations to Google drive
User can save animations in the browser via LocalStorage, then brows local saves in pop up window
Sprites can be downloaded as a gif file (GIFEncoder library)
The web app has a simple user page with some User Info, User Gallery and Animation Page
User Gallery displays all animations saved by user in form of cards with info and action buttons
Animation Cards' buttons allow to delete, edit and copy animation, and get detailed info on the Animation Page
Edit or Copy the animation opens canvas with saved animation and all its settings (number of frames, their content, FPS, palette, etc)

description: Alexis is a landing page, designed as a visit card of a company.
The page's layout is fully responsible, the navigation bar has desktop
and mobile layouts. There is an animated slider for Testimonials and Team-member info block
that slides-in onClick with transition effects. Some other blocks have onHover and onClick effects.
Hexal is a single page website, product of design experimentations with hexagons and simple animation.
The page is created with HTML and CSS, it has simple static layout. The hexagons are arranged in grid
template, have onHover animation effects. There is a form with validated fileds.
GoFuckBiz.com - Forum of successful webmasters. The main objective was to create wireless CSS
for PHP template with layout for mobile devices. The page has styled pagination, variety of forms,
different types of forum messages (citation, code, images, texts, etc), styled action buttons.
Gritella lingerie is an eCommerce website which is made with WordPress and WooCommerce plugin.
Content is manageable through the CMS admin panel of the website. The data stored with MySQL. Main features: ...
warning: The project was closed in Aug 2021, the website is now stored in a free web hosting and some
functionality can be unavailable (no SSL, captcha, google/social login, other APIs).
